location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 55 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges commands received from Bombay (including details of treaties with Spain and France which it promises to observe). The letter also provides a summary of political developments in Perisa including news that Ally Morad Khan [Ali Murad Khan] has left Isfahan with a large force and is thought to be bound for Azarbijan [Azerbaijan]. Several other administrative issues are also discussed.
